methods.name: updatePosition
methods.description: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the menu without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it
methods.description_zh: 对于某些自定义方案，Quasar 无法自动重新定位菜单，而不会产生明显的性能缺陷，因此最佳解决方案是在需要时调用此方法

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus menu; if you have content with autofocus attribute, it will directly focus it
methods.description_zh: 焦点菜单;如果你有带有 autofocus 属性的内容，它会直接聚焦它

events.name: escape-key
events.description: Emitted when ESC key is pressed; Does not get emitted if Menu is 'persistent'
events.description_zh: 按下 ESC 键时发出;如果 Menu 是 'persistent' ，则不会发出

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

fit.description: Allows the menu to match at least the full width of its target
fit.description_zh: 允许菜单至少匹配其目标的整个宽度

cover.description: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the 'self' and 'fit' props are no longer effective
cover.description_zh: 允许菜单覆盖其目标。使用时，'self' 和 'fit' props 不再有效

anchor.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target
anchor.description_zh: 两个值设置菜单相对于其目标的起始位置或锚点

self.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
self.description: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target
self.description_zh: 两个值设置菜单相对于其目标的位置

offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于水平和垂直偏移菜单（以像素为单位）

touch-position.description: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched
touch-position.description_zh: 允许在单击或触摸菜单的目标时通过鼠标位置设置目标位置

persistent.description: Allows the menu to not be dismissed by a click/tap outside of the menu or by hitting the ESC key; Also, an app route change won't dismiss it
persistent.description_zh: 允许不通过单击/点击菜单外部或按 ESC 键来关闭菜单;此外，应用程序路线更改不会关闭它

no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss the popup; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set
no-route-dismiss.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会关闭弹出窗口;如果还设置了 'persistent' prop，则无需设置它

auto-close.description: Allows any click/tap in the menu to close it; Useful instead of attaching events to each menu item that should close the menu on click/tap
auto-close.description_zh: 允许单击/点击菜单中的任何按钮来关闭它;有用的，而不是将事件附加到每个菜单项，这些菜单项应在单击/点击时关闭菜单

separate-close-popup.description: Separate from parent menu, marking it as a separate closing point for v-close-popup (without this, chained menus close all together)
separate-close-popup.description_zh: Separate from parent menu，将其标记为 v-close-popup 的单独关闭点（如果没有这个，链接的菜单会一起关闭）

square.description: Forces content to have squared borders
square.description_zh: 强制内容具有方形边框

no-refocus.description: (Accessibility) When Menu gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus
no-refocus.description_zh: （辅助功能）当 Menu 被隐藏时，不要重新聚焦在以前具有焦点的 DOM 元素上

no-focus.description: (Accessibility) When Menu gets shown, do not switch focus on it
no-focus.description_zh: （辅助功能）当显示 Menu 时，不要将焦点切换到它上面

max-height.description: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name
max-height.description_zh: 菜单的最大高度;以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称
max-height.desc: The maximum height of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.description: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name
max-width.description_zh: 菜单的最大宽度;以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称
max-width.desc: The maximum width of the menu; Size in CSS units, including unit name

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

context-menu.description: Allows the component to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click (or long tap on mobile)
context-menu.description_zh: 允许组件的行为类似于上下文菜单，该菜单通过右键单击（或在移动设备上长按）打开

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）
